sim_community

Source: vignettes/sim_community.Rmd
sim_community.Rmd
library(birdsize)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

Simulation from a hypothetical BBS route

Load and preprocess data. The demo_route_raw dataset is a synthetic dataset with the same column names and AOUs drawn from the BBS data set.


demo_route_raw <- demo_route_raw

demo_route_clean <- demo_route_raw %>%
  filter_bbs_survey() %>%
  dplyr::filter(year == 1994)

head(demo_route_clean)
#>   record_id   routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year  aou count10
#> 1    900000 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 4730       8
#> 2    900029 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 3570      15
#> 3    900058 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 5261       7
#> 4    900087 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 3460      11
#> 5    900145 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 3950       9
#> 6    900174 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 3280      10
#>   count20 count30 count40 count50 stoptotal speciestotal
#> 1      12      15      12      15         5           62
#> 2      10      14       7      16         5           62
#> 3      10      10       9      14         5           50
#> 4      14      12      16      16         5           69
#> 5       8      25      15      21         5           78
#> 6      12      17       9      11         5           59
set.seed(22)

demo_route_sims <- community_generate(community_data_table = demo_route_clean)

head(demo_route_sims)
#>   record_id   routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year count10 count20
#> 1    900000 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994       8      12
#> 2    900000 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994       8      12
#> 3    900000 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994       8      12
#> 4    900000 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994       8      12
#> 5    900000 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994       8      12
#> 6    900000 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994       8      12

Simulation given speciesâ€™ names 


demo_route_names <- demo_route_clean %>%
  left_join(select(sd_table, aou, genus, species)) %>%
  select(-aou)
#> Joining, by = "aou"

set.seed(22)

demo_route_names_sims <- community_generate(demo_route_names)

head(demo_route_names_sims)
#>   record_id   routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year count10 count20

Simulation given mean size measurements 


demo_route_means <- demo_route_clean %>%
  left_join(select(sd_table, aou, mean_mass)) %>%
  select(-aou) %>%
  rename(mean_size = mean_mass)
#> Joining, by = "aou"



set.seed(22)

demo_route_means_sims <- community_generate(demo_route_means)

head(demo_route_means_sims)

Simulation given mean size and sd measurements 


demo_route_mean_sds <- demo_route_clean %>%
  left_join(select(sd_table, aou, mean_mass, mean_sd)) %>%
  select(-aou) %>%
  rename(mean_size = mean_mass,
         sd_size = mean_sd)
#> Joining, by = "aou"



set.seed(22)

demo_route_mean_sds_sims <- community_generate(demo_route_mean_sds)

head(demo_route_mean_sds_sims)
#>   record_id   routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year count10 count20

Simulation given a mix of AOUs and mean sizes 

demo_route_mix <- bind_rows(
  demo_route_clean[1:14,],
  demo_route_means[15:27,]
)

head(demo_route_mix)
#>   record_id   routedataid countrynum statenum route rpid year  aou count10
#> 1    900000 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 4730       8
#> 2    900029 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 3570      15
#> 3    900058 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 5261       7
#> 4    900087 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 3460      11
#> 5    900145 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 3950       9
#> 6    900174 9009911011994        900       99     1  101 1994 3280      10
#>   count20 count30 count40 count50 stoptotal speciestotal mean_size
#> 1      12      15      12      15         5           62        NA
#> 2      10      14       7      16         5           62        NA
#> 3      10      10       9      14         5           50        NA
#> 4      14      12      16      16         5           69        NA
#> 5       8      25      15      21         5           78        NA
#> 6      12      17       9      11         5           59        NA
